name: plan_mustgather
description: Plan for collecting a must-gather archive from an OpenShift cluster. Must-gather is a tool for collecting cluster data related to debugging and troubleshooting like logs, kubernetes resources, etc.

arguments.name: node_name
arguments.description: Specific node name to run must-gather pod on

arguments.name: node_selector
arguments.description: Node selector in key=value,key2=value2 format to filter nodes for the pod

arguments.name: namespace
arguments.description: Privileged namespace to use for must-gather (auto-generated if not specified)

arguments.name: since
arguments.description: Only gather data newer than this duration (eg. 5s, 2m5s, or 3h6m10s) defaults to all data.

arguments.name: host_network
arguments.description: Use host network for must-gather pod (true/false)

arguments.name: keep_resources
arguments.description: Keep pod resources after collection (true/false, default: false)

arguments.name: all_component_images
arguments.description: Include must-gather images from all installed operators (true/false)

arguments.name: images
arguments.description: Comma-separated list of custom must-gather container images
